headline: How VICI Properties, Open Text, And Hess Midstream Can Put Cash In Your Pocket
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. VICI Properties, Open Text, and Hess Midstream have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. ...
